snippet: While it might not be completely smooth, more than 50,000 4-year-olds will start prekindergarten on Thursday, primarily thanks to Mayor Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Editorial contends the more than 50,000 children entering into free, full-day, New York City-wide prekindergarten is milestone for education reform; praises Mayor Bill de Blasio for following through on his campaign promise; maintains program looks solid, safe and ready to start.
lead_paragraph: While it might not be completely smooth, more than 50,000 4-year-olds will start prekindergarten on Thursday, primarily thanks to Mayor Bill de Blasio.
